title: Inverse Hyperbolic Cosine Calculation
description: This function calculates the inverse hyperbolic cosine (ACOSH) of a given real number input. The function uses the mathematical formula ACOSH(x) = ln(sqrt(x^2 - 1) + x) to compute the result.
name: ACOSH

input.name: X
input.description: The input value for which the inverse hyperbolic cosine is to be calculated. This value must be greater than or equal to 1.

return_value.description: The result of the inverse hyperbolic cosine calculation.
